website_summaries.verdict: A premium watercraft cover that will maintain its appearance for an extended period of time.
pros: Includes three sets of tightening belts
Boasts double stitching, which guarantees outstanding durability
Equipped with 240D woven polyester material with a waterproof PU coating
Sold with a top-notch carry bag, which makes it simple to take the cover from place to place
cons: Sometimes can be tough to attach the cover to a watercraft

customer_reviews.title: Fair Warning, These Are Not Durable.  Lasted Less Than A Year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these covers for my Jet skis last year. The skis are located on our dock and are partially covered. In less than one year both covers deteriorated from the weather and both have multiple rips rendering them useless. The covers do not hold up in the outdoor elements. I expected at least a years worth of durability, however I now have to buy two new covers. Very disappointing that they can advertise the product is Water proof and Sun proof when in less than a years usage, they are neither.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd one in 3 years. Our ski is out all summer - its an easy on off cover that does not take alot of effort. Stays put in storms. Not for winter - but a great day to day cover!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Perfetto

customer_reviews.title: great product but we had a lite snow in Georgia ...
customer_reviews.text: great product but we had a lite snow in Georgia and the weight of the snow (a few inches) made the tarp rip to pieces
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Fits tight.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2019 Seadoo GTX Limited which is approx. 135 inches long.
customer_reviews.author: Eezee

customer_reviews.title: Boat cover
customer_reviews.text: very lightweight. After 3 months had pinpoint holes I can see light through.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Universal
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid cover, straps that came with it are decent. This is a good option if you want a discount cover that will universally fit almost any PWC. I have a two up Sea Doo and this did the trick but by no means fits like a glove
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: So far so good they got loose which I like makes it very is to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Julien H.

customer_reviews.title: This seller is class A number 1
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many of this product NEVER EVER had any issues with the seller or the product. Hoping they continue with this product for a long time. Don't hesitate Buy now with peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Barbato

customer_reviews.title: Ripped easy
customer_reviews.text: Easily ripped after 5 months. I may took cover off and on total of 6 times in 7 months before it ripped
customer_reviews.author: leonard durso

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Does not fit as advertised ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Does not fit as advertised. My jet ski is 11'6" and this barely covers to the back of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Rierson

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased! Fit great and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased ! Fit great and easy to put on !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: RockyMRanger 136''-145'' Universal PWC Cover Fit Seadoo Jet Ski Polaris Yamaha Kawasaki YPWC4
product_meta.description:
Item specification:

1, Material: 240D woven polyester material with PU coating, which is water-proof.
2, Color: Silver
3, Size: fit the PWC jet ski from 136" to 145" length.
4, Elastic bottom hem. Has 3 sets tighten belts.
5, Double stitching(Sewing), which is much more durable than one line stitching.
6, A same material carry bag free of charge.
feature_bullets: Material: 240D woven polyester material with PU coating, which is water-proof.
Size: fit the PWC jet ski from 136" to 145" length.
Elastic bottom hem. Has 3 sets tighten belts.
Double stitching(Sewing), which is much more durable than one line stitching.
A same material carry bag free of charge.
